title: uyyaalaliga vaiya
sahitya:
uyyAlalUgavayya shrI rAma

anupallavi

 sayyAta pATalanu sat-sArvabhauma

caraNam 1

 kamalajAdyakhila surulu ninu koluva vimalulaina munIndrulu 
dhyAnimpa kamanIya bhAgavatulu guNa kIrtanamulu nAlApambula sEyaga
   
caraNam 2

 nAradAdulu merayacu nutiyimpa sAramulu bAga vinucu ninnu 
nammuvArala sadA brOcucu vEda sAra saphalanu jUcucu shrI rAma
   
caraNam 3

 nava mOhanangulaina sura satulu vivaramuga bADaga nI bhAgyamA
navaratna maNTapamuna tyAgarAja vinutAkrti bUnina shrI rAma
